code: import React from'react';import'./TotalDuration.scss';var TotalDuration=function TotalDuration(props){var totalWorkoutTime=function totalWorkoutTime(){var rest=props.rest,list=props.list;var workTime=list.map(function(e){return e.duration;}).reduce(function(a,b){return a+b;},0);var restTime=rest*list.length;if(restTime<=0){return formatTime(0);}else{return formatTime(workTime+restTime-rest);}};var formatTime=function formatTime(secs){var minutes=('0'+Math.floor(secs/60)).slice(-2);var seconds=('0'+(secs-minutes*60)).slice(-2);return"".concat(minutes,":").concat(seconds);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"total-duration-style"},totalWorkoutTime());};export default TotalDuration;
